Wincci Z

Project Title

Weather Forecast

Description

Using React-Redux for a weather forecast web App maybe a bit overkilled. I just used this classic react assignment to demonstrate my knowledge of React-Redux.

This project is still ongoing. I am working on how to use canvas in React to make the background change according to different weather conditions!

Technologies

React, Redux, Boostrap, Openweather API

Role

React-Redux

Year

2018
